website_summaries.verdict: Anker's $80 Soundcore Spirit Dot 2 earphones combine a bass-boosted sound signature with a wire-free, gym-friendly build.
cons: No track backwards or volume controls

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: These didn't quite work for me whilst cycling on the Turbo trainer indoors. Occasionally when I wiped my face with a towel it beeped and switched off the right earbud even though the towel didn't touch it (from what I could see) which was strange. This happened at least 10 times during an hours ride and therefore makes them useless for me. Presumably it might have something to do with the touch sensitive controls on the buds... They are secure in the ears and have decent sound but I have to send them back unfortunately..
customer_reviews.author: B. Alberink

customer_reviews.title: Compact with great audio
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Not into the other type earbuds with the long microphone stick, wanted something less conspicuous and these fit the bill nicely. Once embedded in your lughole, they do not move and are really comfortable to wear for long periods. Sound is fantastic and Bass is heavy, though not overly imo. Box is sleek and love the way the lid slides up instead of open. Not tested the recieving calls, etc side of things and probably won't, as most people tend to text me! So look elsewhere for a review of that side of things. Another reason I wasn't interested in the stick type buds. All in all a pretty quality product
customer_reviews.author: Adiman

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Paired first time and have stayed stable since. Nice and secure in the ear and comfortable to wear. Decent amount of bass. edited to add that I have since gone on and purchased Comply Truly Wireless Pro Memory Foam Earphone Tips to replace the buds that come with the soundcore. Really helps to make the treble shine.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme D.

customer_reviews.title: Great bass sound – works with Macs! :)
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible earbuds for the price and sound great – although they are quite bass-heavy, (but that's a minor thing for me). They're lightweight, comfortable to wear and quick to charge. Obviously connecting to an iPhone is a doddle, but the big plus for me is that they also connect to my 2013 MacBook and 2017 iMac with no loss of signal or interference. I'd certainly recommend these for commuting, gym/exercise or when you don't want anyone else at work to hear your music!
customer_reviews.author: M. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bassy sound . Big fan of Anker products and these are far better than alot of more expensive earphones. The fit took a few attempts to get right but once sorted they are snug and ultra secure . Certainly won't be falling out . The sound produced is clear and full.
customer_reviews.author: Gaz C1980

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and broken within 3 weeks. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok considering price, but usability is unacceptable. Designed and sold as exercise headphones, but he slightest bit of movement sees the headphones try to use voice activation, even if you have disabled that feature on your phone. As a result, your music will pause every 1-2 minutes. Makes them pretty much useless as exercise headphones, then. I also attempt to call random contacts from my phone, despite me not having voice activation enabled or saying these people's names. 3 weeks in, and the right headphone has broken and only plays sound at a very low volume. I guess you get what you pay for. Probably worth saving a bit and getting something that actually works as labelled.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, extra bass
customer_reviews.text: I've swapped a few pairs recently, never been able to find the right balance and price point. These are so light and comfy with a perfect fit, nice and secure. They have given the bass a bit of a punch which I like and for the price you can't really fault them great battery life, easy to pair. No app support at the moment but it's not really necessary. Touch controls are useful but I don't use them too much.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys Barker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good for me, value for money only if u buy them with the discount. I wouldn’t buy them for 80£. Comfort mmm not so great, the medium airwings hurt my ears and the small ones had no “wings” on so fell off my ears. I tried different sizes with no luck and had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Rosu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have Sony WF-1000XM3, the sound quality and noise cancellation is by far better in those. However, I bought these primarily to use in the gym as the Sony would always fall out. These are just amazing in comparison when it comes to comfort and secure fit. In regards to the actually sound quality, for what you are paying, they are really good. The bass is really good and I think for some people, it might be too much. But I like my bass. For the money, these are definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds sound quality is excellent! I wasn't expecting such a clear sound. The bases are very strong. The earbuds stay in place and you can exercise without fearing to lose one. Anker is delivering great earbuds which compete with the big brands at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre G.

customer_reviews.title: Madenning controls and poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great in one of my ears and not in the other. The choice of extra rubber fittings haven't helped. Love the sound but the controls are way too over complicated. Touching my right ear for two seconds launches Google assistant all the time. Not what you need while running. A real shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: this is the second pair of anker wireless earbuds that i've used, both of which have broken within a month. I was unable to get a warranty refund on my last pair, never buying from anker again
customer_reviews.author: Cian

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds for this price .
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds are better than I expected . Bass is so hard . Noise isolation are perfect . Case made from nice touch plastic . Earbuds sit in ear so comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Arturs Jezerskihs

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not for little ears
customer_reviews.text: They fall out of my ears even with the smallest coverings.
customer_reviews.author: Hayleyc

customer_reviews.title: I love these, Awsome well rounded sound and superb bass
customer_reviews.text: Ive got a few Wireless Earbuds and not doscounting the Liberty 2 Pros which are great but I feel these are better and specially in one key area that makes them superb...... If you ever want to just wear one earbud to keep one ear open and you lose the complete sound and bassfidelity that two together make..... these dont, in a mono use the sound is so good the bass levels still warm and fulfilling to what your listening too. Ive found a perfect solution for both stereo and mono use in these. I buy them again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Wak

customer_reviews.title: Bass, How Low Can You Go!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them 2 months ago and have had no issues with them. I mostly use them when I'm playing basketball (usually around 1-2 hrs per session). Was playing almost 5 days a week and it stays in your ears, even with all the intense jumping, running & plus sweating. Love the bass and the way they slot into the ear (They fit so snug they almost sound like noise cancelling headphones). Really happy with these. I also have the Liberty Air but I much prefer the sound and fit of these. Great job Anker/Soundcore (2 Thumbs Up)
customer_reviews.author: Kaan

customer_reviews.title: These were marvelous until...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the right earpiece stopped working after 2 days. I replaced these with the Liberty 2 Pro's as they have more options for audio controls on the phone. The Liberty2 pro's are not as comfortable nor do they sounds as good out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: MattP

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, really nice bass and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty good, especially in its price range - does not fall out, not even when jumping a lot, once happened though that one of the sides turned off multiple times randomly, and for me, the right after a few hours might becomes a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Peets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sounding mic&speakers
customer_reviews.text: These don’t have the premium features I enjoy like my liberty air 2’s, but these stay in my ears with zero issues . I got caught in a monsoon downpour, they still work flawlessly. Pros: -sound very good -stay firmly and comfortably in place.( I have a difficult time finding buds that don’t fall out.) -discrete ish design - mic works and sounds great Cons: - charging case opens very easily ( but smoothly) -it doesn’t support: volume control on buds, soundcore app, or wireless charging. ( I wish it had app features but by no means a deal breaker.)
customer_reviews.author: Leland

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sound great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ear buds! They are comfortable and sound great! It took a few tries to get the fit right, but once I figured out the right combination of EarTips and EarWings, they are very comfortable to wear around. I honestly have never been able to find a pair of ear buds that don't fall out of my ears, but since I dialed in the fit, I have not dropped one yet! I have tried various brands of buds, and for the most part they are uncomfortable to wear and they don't stay in my ears. These also work well while on the phone, so far everyone I've talked to said they sound good.
customer_reviews.author: potter hill

customer_reviews.title: Half way to great! And I do mean halfway.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love these earbuds but to a point. The sound quality, like other Soundcore products, is great. They are my preferred in the car or walking earbuds. I've relegated my others to a support role. However, the title says halfway decent, and that is where I have an issue. The sound is superb, but my right earbud is not pairing to any of my phones. The left pairs without a hitch, but the right one does not whether I turn off and turn back on or unpair and pair. It charges and tells me it is at full strength, but it just won't pair. This is why it's not getting a 5 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Ford

customer_reviews.title: Returned same day I got em
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to these as they were my first true wireless earbuds. Sadly, after having them for less than 24 hrs, I am left with disappointment. The left earbud refused to play audio, even though they (supposedly) were connected. I tried reseting them mutliple times with no luck. When I went to the internet for troubleshooting, there was nothing that came up for this model, only its brother and sister models.
customer_reviews.author: Z9 Movies

customer_reviews.title: AirWings do not fit well
customer_reviews.text: The medium size airwing hurt after 15-20 minutes and the small one is loose. They need to resize the options for the airwings. Maybe offer 4 sizes. Also they do not pair to the app, so your listening options are limited. I would not recommend this model unless you know they fit you comfortably and securely and you don’t have the money for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: I have only had them for 4 months, and the sound quality just failed this last week.
customer_reviews.text: So I have had these for 4 months, the sound quality was awesome, and everything was fine, then this last week all the sounds in both headphones fell drastically. It now sounds like everything is extremely quite even at the highest output for my phone. I thought it had to do with the charge, so I recharged them and nothing changed. I'm really sad as I loved these, and I would love a new pair, but I can't afford to replace these. I have another pair of your product that is a year old and still works fine, so I had high hopes for this.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Overall they're mediocre. For closer $70 I thought they would be better. First impression they feel nice and look extremely premium today is my 2nd day with them and the right ear bud died out before I left work I barely can hear it unless my volume is close to max. The battery life is avg 2-3 hours. I work in an office so I usually listen to music low and surprised they didn't max the 5 hr limit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wow....
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I have tried so many different ear buds but this product definitely surprised me. Very easy to connect with your device. And super light in your ears. If you work out and are thinking to get some ear buds for the gym.... Well... Look no further. And the best part of it is they they will stay in your ear no matter what.... Just an amazing product...
customer_reviews.author: Fabian.T

customer_reviews.title: Nothing comparable at this price point!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Anker products for many years now and I’ve always been pleased with them. They stand behind their products and warranties, which is hard to find sometimes! I have bigger ears and I was worried that this type of earbud would stick out brining more attention to my ears, but they fit really well and don’t stick out much at all. I wear them on my motorcycle and the sound quality is great! They fit snug and never fall out even at 75mph.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for music, not calls
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound on these, especially the bass! They fit really well too. But sent them back for 2 reasons. 1. everyone I talked to on the phone said I kept cutting out (don't know if it was just this set or if it's a poor design). 2. the battery life is pretty sad compared to other models. 3. I could live with this, but the case is pretty flimsy and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo C.

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: All of my expectations were met except one. I wish there was an app to adjust the sound. Any adjustments to the EQ in Spotify decreases the volume. Other than that, I'm very happy with the sound. I ride my bike for a couple of hours at a time. This is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: TruthFLA

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless earbuds, bad microphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality, battery life, fit, Bluetooth connection are all excellent. The phone calls with these are horrible. Every single time I’ve tried to use them as my microphone, they can’t hear me
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a couple weeks now and I love them. Great sound in a great sized package. Battery life is good, lasts me several days of moderate use. Love the small size and weight, no issues falling out during workout and no connectivity issues. Can also wear them at night before falling asleep and don’t bother my ears like others have.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Senior

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound/build great price fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about Anker their products are great! I own a set of noise cancelling headphones and the spirit dot 2 earbuds and they both sound badass. Great lows mids and clear highs. Shipping was fast and the quality is great too I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Almazan

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for running
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds for the purpose of wearing while I run or when I'm at the gym. For running these buds do an excellent job of staying in your ears and they sound great too. Good balance with plenty of bass. The only negative I have found is the earbuds can't play the previous song.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds are a perfect fit and the sound quality is good. The bass is just as the company says it is. Unfortunately, the connectivity issues are all the time. It's gotten to the point to where I can't connect to any devices. I thought maybe it was user error. I had others check to see if it was connecting for them. They couldn't get them to connect to their devices. Thank you soundcore for replacing the device. The new ones work great and the connectivity issues are not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: These are my first nice pair of ear buds. They come with a variety of swappable parts so that you can get the perfect fit. They are so comfortable in my ears and I’m not having to constantly adjust them like all of my cheap ear buds. Pairing with my iPhone and my Peloton bike was a cinch and they do a great job of canceling out noise. The sound quality is excellent- both bass and treble. These are an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Anger does it again!
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review...these are great for listening only...to music etc. They SUCK for calls...doesn't pick up your talking like normal headsets and instead picks up your voice as if on speaker from the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very limited battery life
customer_reviews.text: After 1.5 hours on the phone they died on me. Haven't been able to use them more than two hrs. They claim 5.5 hours on the product specs. I did not experience that. Otherwise they are ok. Also, today they just died on me with full battery.
customer_reviews.author: Stylianos

customer_reviews.title: Like your not wearing, amazing sound and bass REALLY GOOD!!! Calls not strong but usable
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are legit, bass is on point!! They feel really comfortable and at a great price range. There is a very slight hesing whenever u type of start a video or music but it does away n can hardly notice it unless you're looking for it. The speakers are good enough to have a conversation using these earbuds but if it was improved they would be a game changer to be honest there are times where a caller says they can't hear to well.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for runners
customer_reviews.text: Having a great experience on my daily runs, 7 miles with plenty of sweat and no issues with fit or charge or sound quality. Absolutely perfect value.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: left ear bud problem
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine because the left ear bud was having a problem , it was skipping lyrics every 10 or 15 mins....don't know why that was happening but....that was the only issue
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: Totally amazing headphones. By far the best value for price ratio. Amazing sound. Much better than any other headphones that I tried. If you are looking for wonderful headphones under $100, don't look any further. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk B.

customer_reviews.title: Great First Impression
customer_reviews.text: Strong, clear bass but doesn't drown out the mids and highs. Fits snug in the ear so should work great for running. Many options for different sized ears.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Took some time for my ears to get used to them. now they are comfy
customer_reviews.text: first my ears hurt slightly till they adapted to them. I tried cycling with them and the fit was tight didnt feel like they were going to fall Overall would recommend, but you need to try each eartip for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: They fit nicely in my ears, they are a bargain in my opinion. I have several Sound Core products and I am pleased with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she was very happy with the fit and sound, at first. These earbuds sounded great and the noise cancellation was above average but the constant pairing issues with her iPhone 11 Pro, made these earbuds a bad choice. I’ll be returning these. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: That dude J

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a defective unit but they sent me another one at no cost. And so far so good great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Tavo

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of them. But we’re uncomfortable in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Great!  I love them!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with these Bluetooth earbuds at all! They charge quickly and I can use them all day without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: crystal sue walker

customer_reviews.title: The mic is not good!
customer_reviews.text: The receiver on the other side, had a high and low audio moments from the speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Karthikeyan Radhakrishna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Better fit, noise cancellation and bass than earbuds costing triple.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Greer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for your money when it comes to bass
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bass on these earbuds, they sound deeper than the liberty 2 pro. The battery life is questionable, however the fit makes up for that. These are my favorite true wireless earbuds for day to day life and the gym. If your active or lazy get these and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and secure in my ears. Excellent sound quality and battery life as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: you won't regret it buying it.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, amazing battery life, great sound, and not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie A.

customer_reviews.title: exceed expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wear them exercising and they stay in my ears, cancel out noise well and have good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, comfortable fit, stay put during a workout
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, with great bass. Customizable fit made them comfortable, stayed put - tested during both a 10 mile run and a heavy bag workout.
customer_reviews.author: CVStar

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects frequently during workout
customer_reviews.text: I beg you not to buy these headphones. They disconnect and power off frequently during a workout and have multiple times. I’m using an iPhone 11 so I know it’s not my phone. Absolutely terrible product and waste of money. Sound quality is fine but the Bluetooth on these things is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Clarity with a nice loud bass
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect choice, if you don't want to drop 150$ on the Liberty pro 2. These accomplish almost just the same and are super comfortable. I would choose these to workout in and the wf-1000xm3 for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but bad hissing
customer_reviews.text: The battery life and fit of these earbuds are both great. Though mine have a problem with an annoying hissing sound when something is playing.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Good sound Crappy Case
customer_reviews.text: Great Earbuds for the money... However the case is definitely cheap and not sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, very powerful, rich sounds from both and even when using one only.
customer_reviews.author: William K. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, I hate them after a solid month. Can't sync them together anymore so I'm listening to one ear. Should've went JBL, Sony, even skull candy would've been better if you ask me. They just cut off mid song with ABSOLUTELY NO TOUCH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Left side low sound
customer_reviews.text: Loved these when I received them the first month. Now the left side is way low can barely hear it. 🤷🏽‍♂️ Update: if ur a normal human being then ur going to clog the little hole in each ear piece. Cleaned them out and work great now 🤦🏽‍♂️Lol
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Perez

customer_reviews.title: okay product
customer_reviews.text: The sound is low even when volume is turned all the way up. Not much bass as expected. Connect quicky but not always at the same time. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: I@munique

customer_reviews.title: You need these
customer_reviews.text: Great earphone! Love the sound and the wings. My only problem was they didn't disconnect from my phone when I put them in the case. But after contacting soundcore we figured out the problem. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: rico

customer_reviews.title: Surprise with high quality
customer_reviews.text: So surprise with the bass of the product, with the price....worth to purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect sound!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds feel comfortable, and the sound quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Aris

customer_reviews.title: Love this product sound is great
customer_reviews.text: the sound is very nice, they also hold the charge love everything about them, I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jorge medina

customer_reviews.title: Fit is kind of funky.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is hard for me personally is hard to get it right. But also the case looks to be really fragile. The cap wiggles off the case as if is gonna to break.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Slightly uncomfortable at first - but they include modular pieces to fit better than stock. When through the washing machine just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S

customer_reviews.title: Problems off the bat
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights on the case are already not working I am not looking forward to the longevity to the product .
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Returning as they're almost unusable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the earbuds I received are just defective or not but they're almost unusable. I bought them to use for running but they're constantly disconnecting mid-run without even being touched. I've yet to finish a run with them where they've maintained connection throughout. I have had great experiences with Anker before so this is a huge let down especially considering the price. Even when they were working I never thought the sound was anything particularly impressive and they're not that comfortable either. I have them connected to my phone, Garmin watch and laptop, and they're subpar on all 3 with connection issues on each of them.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality WAS great with really good base but after just a few months the sounds in the left earbud is significantly deteriorated and is now much quieter (the right bud less so). Given lock down, these headphones haven’t had to endure any rain or harsh weather to justify the effect on the quality of the sound. They haven’t been dropped or experienced any physical knocks either. Given the price, I expected these to considerably last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had these ear phones for less than a month and the volume in the left ear bud stoped working correctly. It is always lower than the right which is very annoying so basically haven't used these since. Also the case seems very flimsy the way the lid slides off feels as though it could break very easily, and sometimes would just slide open in my bag. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great Customer Care
customer_reviews.text: Great product, yours isn't? Contact customer service. They have the some of the best customer services I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: A great product and certainly compares well with the bigger know brands. Excellent sound quality and stand up very well to repeated use during heavy exercise. Remain solid in the ear during running and cycling. Very good customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Popping noise at full volume (defective)
customer_reviews.text: Very good bass (initially). After further use, the earphones developed a 'popping' sound when at top volume . I thought it may be a vibration issue with the ear moulds , but quickly ascertained that it wasn't. Unsure whether this is a common issue, or just something due to mine being faulty.
customer_reviews.author: David_2019TH

customer_reviews.title: the sound was the only upside
customer_reviews.text: No volume control, cant turn off google asisstant (if I would be running or on my bike, this would spell disaster) Also for me personally not small enough, it put pressure on my inner ear but that is subjective I guess.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Volume issue with some devices
customer_reviews.text: Specially with Oppo Reno 2 pro, there is a compatibility issue. Sound doesn't go high. I have checked every possible way to increase the volume. Then found out that there are other people facing this issue in different devices. Overall sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I experienced some issues with earbuds, as it can be expected with any company at some point but they resolved the issue perfectly. I'm satisfied with a product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elvijs

customer_reviews.title: Better than 180 quid ones
customer_reviews.text: Spent 180 quid on some Sony's the other month and these are bloody better. Wish I'd just stumped for these. Bellend.
customer_reviews.author: L Maycock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sports buds
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Stay my ears whilst mountain biking. Lots of different shapes and moulds to fit perfectly. Sound quality is top. Really easy to connect. Well presented and great carry case?
customer_reviews.author: Rob S

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Well I won a competition to get these for a quid , sounds good , very comfortable , long play time before recharge
customer_reviews.author: A. Ashbrook

product_meta.title: Anker Soundcore Spirit Dot 2 True Wireless Earbuds, Deep Bass, IPX7 Waterproof, Sweatproof, 16H Playtime, Fast Charge, Comfortable AirWings, Bluetooth 5, Mini Sports Earphones, Workout, Gym, Jogging
product_meta.description:
Key Features

Diamond-Coated Composite Drivers: Extend high and low frequencies to reproduce sound with stunning clarity and thumping bass. 
BassUp Technology: Exclusive technology conducts real-time analysis and enhancement of your audio's bass frequencies to add powerful sonic punch. 
IPX7 Waterproof and SweatGuard: Spirit Dot 2 true wireless earbuds are protected by an ultra-waterproof casing that’s so strong, not even sweat vapor can penetrate it.
Comfortable and Secure Fit: Our unique AirWings have been custom-designed using ultra-soft silicone to fit virtually any ear. 
Up to 16 Hours of Playtime: 5.5 hours of playtime on a single charge is extended to 16 hours with the charging case. 
Fast-Charging: A 10-minute charge will give you an hour of listening. 
Mono or Stereo: Each earbud individually connects to your device for lower latency and seamless switching between using a single earbud or both.
Stable Connectivity: An LDS antenna and Bluetooth 5 work together to create a stable link between your wireless earbuds and device.
One-Step Pairing: Spirit Dot 2 true wireless earbuds use our PUSH AND GO technology to automatically connect with the last paired device.
Touch Control: Use to play/pause music, answer calls, or activate your device’s voice assistant.
feature_bullets: Thumping Bass: Spirit Dot 2’s composite driver is surrounded by an elastic, bass-maximizing material to increase bass output by up to 100%. It’s further enhanced by our BassUp technology which uses a custom algorithm to analyze and intensify bass in real-time.

Sweatproof and Waterproof: Spirit Dot 2 true wireless earbuds boast IPX7-rated protection that’s strengthened by exclusive SweatGuard technology—an industry-leading sealing process and coating that stops liquids and sweat vapor from breaching the casing.
Zero-Pressure AirWings: Our unique hollow AirWings have a flexible, soft silicone build that partially deflates to conform to the shape and size of your ears for a secure fit with unmatched comfort.

Compact Fit: Spirit Dot 2 true wireless earbuds are ultra-small and 20% slimmer* to ensure they fit comfortably and discreetly in your ears—no matter whether you’re working out, playing sports, or even sleeping.
MCSync True-Wireless Connection Technology: Latency is reduced by up to 30% and you’re able to switch between using two earbuds or a single one effortlessly.
